H

handleTie() - Method in class Voting
If a tie is found, then we perform a tie break by using the SecureRandom class.SecureRandom is designed to be a cryptographically secure random number generator and should help ensure that we are choosing candidates fairly by essentially simulating a “coin toss” where each tied candidate has an equal probability of being chosen as the winner.
